website_summaries.verdict: Families needing a versatile sun hat set to share between children will appreciate this breathable pair.
pros: Purchase includes a set of two
Each side of brim has a snap button for children who want to wear their brims up or down
cons: Hats are shipped tightly folded, leaving a heavy crease in the fabric

customer_reviews.title: Great hats for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to wearing our hats this summer. Seems a little stiff so hoping they just need a break in period. It fits both my 4 year old and me. Chins strap works great and help hold it on for my son. This is the gray color.
customer_reviews.author: D. Delcher

customer_reviews.title: We need more!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hats when I read in another review that a woman and her toddler son were able to wear them. I got the green ones and my daughter and I look super cute in them like Troop Beverly Hills cute. It was then that my husband came home and decided to take mine to work with him as he was going to be outside a lot that day. So now I'm considering ordering two more just so everyone has one. We're total dorks now but we're happy dorks.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Charles

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This setup is cool. Keeps plenty of sun away when you want a break from the sun. I received it today and plan on wearing it just about everywhere (5/22/20). Was 81 degrees and sunny when I tried it. Comfortable and the face covering is mesh, small holes but very normal to breathe through. I'm 6'4", not sure what my hat size is yet probably normal for a tall 250 lb'er; just know it fits me perfectly (without using the headband drawstring). Between the chin drawstring and the headband drawstring I feel it would fit just about anyone from my size down.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: These hats were perfect for me and my teen
customer_reviews.text: These hats were perfect for me and my teen. We've worn them all summer in our hiking and camping trips and these were a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: glitterbeach

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sun hat!
customer_reviews.text: I can still wear my shorty beanie underneath this hat to keep perspiration from soaking into the brim on these lovely ☹ PA days of heat and humidity. The ability to adjust the fit with the pull string is great. They are very comfortable and provide very good sun protection for the ears and neck. They’ll get plenty of use on our walks! Since there are two per package it many be a fairly long while before I'll wear them out, but I would order them again when needed!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: They're great! Plenty of room for my big head
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding hats that fit because of the size of my head. I read the reviews of other people with the same issue, so I decided to give this a shot. Wow! They're great! Plenty of room for my big head, but the second hat works well for my daughter when she cinches it up in back without looking bunchy. I like the versatility of the side snaps, how light weight they are and not having to worry about them flying off in the wind because of the neck strap. I'm looking forward to wearing these out on the water this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these two hats for sun and bug protection. They are very easily adjusted for different head circumferences. I have accidentally bent the brim but was able to get it back in shape by placing objects on it to hold it in place overnight. I was caught in a drenching rain and this hat is the only thing I had for protection. The crown is thinner material so the top of my head was soaked but the wide stiffer brim kept my face and glasses dry. The hat dried quickly and looks like new. I actually bought both hats for myself but my husband liked them so he took one. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: bayleaf

customer_reviews.title: It is adjustable and lightweight! Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 year old great-nephew. He loves being outside & he's into catch & release fishing right now. He grabbed them out of the box and slapped one on his head immediately. He is so active outdoors I worry about long term exposure to the sun. This hat is adjustable and I wanted something he could wear now & as he grows. Even though I'm not the one using the hat it is everything it claims to be & that is always a plus. I highly recommend this hat.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Pattison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! Bought one for each person in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Bought one for each person in a family of 5- that’s 2 adults and 3 young kids. With the handy drawstring placement around the crown of the hat they can be pulled tighter to fit the smaller kids just fine and also be the perfect size for adults. They are lightweight and keep the sun off, they do well with water and sweat, and keep the head cool. We’ve all worn ours out on the water, camping, at the beach, and hiking. Perfect for all events. Can’t recomend enough. If we were to ever lose or damage one, I’d replace it with the same thing without a second thought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hats for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are great hats for the yard. Lightweight and not too hot. I just retired so I'm spending a lot more time in the garden. These hats are perfect for the yard. Any hat is going to make your head sweat but these are pretty comfortable. I plan on using it also for fishing. More protection than a baseball hat. I think the pricing is great for 2 hats. OK....so I may look a little dorky wearing them but I'm 65 so I don't really care. I'm not going to a fancy event in my new hat. Just protecting my noggin.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S.

customer_reviews.title: It fit great with no adjustment req'd
customer_reviews.text: It fit great with no adjustment req'd. There is an adjustment lanyard for pulling it tighter if you need that. The hat is very light weight, comfortable, and has a nice mesh breathable part to the top. I bought it to wear when I'm looking at an iPad screen and need to cast a shadow which blocks the sun from hitting the iPad directly and it worked like a charm! I use the ipAd to monitor and control a Phantom 4 Pro drone so blocking the sun so I can see the iPad is very important. In my opinion, this hat would like good on men and women and everything in between ;-)
customer_reviews.author: dkeberhardt

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and breathable
customer_reviews.text: I ended up completely enjoying this hat. I have the same general style hats from the Army and from my hunting but those are made of thicker material and are not breathable. This turned out just perfect for long through hikes. Very breathable, tough enough to hold up to daily use and sun, lightweight, and light in color so the sun is not frying it. Easy to cram into my shorts pocket when I was not wearing it, and then just pull it out and no problems returning to shape for head wear.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: defective chin strap latch
customer_reviews.text: The little sphere that allows you to change the circumference of the chin strap has been installed improperly. Mine easily slides up and down and when I push the button it cannot be moved up and down. As a result the wind blows my hat off. So now I use a clothespin to bite across the chin strap below where I set the sphere and it cannot go down by itself. The company has sent me a replacement at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: it

customer_reviews.title: What a steal!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging folds the hats and leaves what looks to be a permanent crease in the brim, $20 for two of these is a stunningly good price even if they are not super sturdy, but they are excellent for putting some shade on the noggin' and even if you just leave them in the car for those times you find you need a hat but forgot to bring one. These hats wear well and look good. I have a big head and leave the headband adjustment all the way out, but my wife appreciates being able to snug it down for a tighter fit when its windy.
customer_reviews.author: Gibberbub

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son-in-law and my grandson. They are thin and cheap. I broke one of the hooks trying to figure the hat/shield out. I turned around and did what I should have done to begin with and ordered them a Columbia Boony hat. We are hoping to get to go on our cruise next March 2021 and I have been buying up Cruise stuff for their Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great hat, Great price
customer_reviews.text: I use mine for outdoor work. It would also be good for hiking or backpacking. It is light weight, well ventilated, and adjusts in size to fit my small head size. The brim is wider than most & shields the sun nicely. Stays on well on windy days with the size adjustment & the chin strap. Highly recommend for its intended purpose. Probably not so much when style is important (I.e. going out to dinner) as it does look a little dorkey. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: tobg

customer_reviews.title: Brim is too stiff.
customer_reviews.text: If you pull the size adjustment strap to tighten the fit, the two sides of the brim twist up or down in opposite directions. This is partly because the brim is too stiff. Also, attaching the side brims to the push-buttons on the side of the top twists the brim in opposite directions. This too is because the brim is too stiff. It's not a bad hat if you don't need to tighten the fit or attache the side brims. I discarded mine.
customer_reviews.author: dcdad

customer_reviews.title: Functionality is great, but looks kinda flat.
customer_reviews.text: The shape is a bit weird, in real life it looks flatter than in the picture. We used these for 2 weeks in Florida followed by 5 weeks in Africa, and my son wore his pretty much day and night. It was very comfortable and light weight and provided good sun protection. Washed well on delicate cycle in the washing machine, too.
customer_reviews.author: Antje

customer_reviews.title: Will keep you out of sun!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I wore these for two weeks in New Mexico while backpacking. They performed very well. Little heavy and the brim is not stiff, but all in all it kept us covered. Price is great!
customer_reviews.author: JeepDad

customer_reviews.title: Good deal and practical
customer_reviews.text: Needed a hat for a trip to both block the sun and also to use with a mosquito head net--very worried about mosquitoes in rural areas of SE Asia. I don't look good in hats and tried repeatedly to find a good, packable straw hat that was stylish but did the job. Then I saw this bargain and went with it for practicality. It's actually not bad at all, sensible, has the strap to hold it on in the wind and, at the price, can be sprayed with permethrin and help keep bugs off and disease away. Might not wear it around a resort, but it's great for practical travel.
customer_reviews.author: Reader-Writer

customer_reviews.title: Love the value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the value for the price. Comparable to products with 5 x the price. I have a very small head and have a difficult time with fit so truly appreciated the adjustable feature. My one suggestion would be to ship it with the brim flat. There is a permanent crease in the brim because of the folded shipment. If you shipped it flat with just the crown pressed down, it would arrive exactly like the Columbia hat I purchased for 5 x the price. Material and quality is very similar.
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: Good Hat
customer_reviews.text: It is a good hat to keep the sun off your head and face while mowing for hours at the time. A little flappy - not stiff enough - gets wet easy from sweat - a little hot on your head - but not as hot as most hats.
customer_reviews.author: GMac

customer_reviews.title: Looks adorable, but the brim is a bit rigid when ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks adorable, but the brim is a bit rigid when buttoning up. Wasn't rigid enough with the brim down to endure a lot of wind at the beach, but still great for coverage from the sun!
customer_reviews.author: JBlacTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff of a brim and cheap plastic buttons in the wrong location.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the hat isn't bad. The problems I had with it (I returned mine) were that the brim is WAY too stiff. It tends to hold it's own shape and look kind of silly. Also, my buttons were LOWER THAN PICTURED. This means that the brim would have this weird look when buttoned. The buttons are a cheap plastic as well, not metal. If it wasn't for those things, this hat would be 5 stars. Unfortunately, I have to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Thowci

customer_reviews.title: Plan to buy more
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hats for my son and I. I like that they are adjustable so we can both wear them (he is 3). It helps him keep his hat on when we are outside playing if I wear the same hat. It provides nice coverage over the face and neck. I plan to buy another set to have one for home and one to keep in the van
customer_reviews.author: eyp

customer_reviews.title: ... took it out for a trial run and I love it. Should have listened to my kids and ...
customer_reviews.text: My hat arrived today so I took it out for a trial run and I love it. Should have listened to my kids and got one weeks ago. It was a little breezy today but the draw-string worked perfectly. I am so glad I got this and the weight is great.. it's not real heavy, so it will be just right for hotter days to come.
customer_reviews.author: Wicker

customer_reviews.title: hat comes without gold colored  badge as shown on amazon website...
customer_reviews.text: I will use it to wash the floor mainly because my kids feel robbed by th ad so we will demonstrate its best use also because the snaps are placed so low the brim has to be folded...made in China
customer_reviews.author: Philip Daughtry

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable for my small head!
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight, breathable sunhat , but best of all, it is adjustable to fit firmly on my tiny head! On one of the two I cut and finished the edges of a hole for when I wear my hair in a high ponytail so it's up off my neck! These hats are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzmom

customer_reviews.title: Cute and work great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2 year old and 4 year old sons for the beach. It adjusts small enough to fit them now, and large enough that it will fit for years to come. We use them on sunny days at the playground too and always get complements on them.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great Hats!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were leaders at our church’s vacation Bible school. The theme of our program this year had to do with wildlife like in Africa. So we were supposed to look like we were on Safari. The hats worked out perfect , putting us into costume.
customer_reviews.author: C Craig Van Gundy

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Items were exactly as described and arrived very quickly. As some reviewers mentioned they were packaged in a plastic bag and placed in a box that was large enough to not deform the brims. Not sure when they changed that, but it was a good change. Well satisfied with the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Tony H.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: The 2-pack is a great value! They fit perfectly and keep good airflow. The quality is much better than expected. They also look better than many other bookie style hats available. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jay-Rod

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!! Originally got it for my husband, but am keeping for myself and giving other one to daughter. I garden and she hikes. The drawstring hatband makes for a perfect fit and chinstrap keeps it from blowing away in the OKLA. wind. The mesh lets your head breathe and stay cooler. It is great for gardening, fishing, and general outside activities. Personally, I think it is very cute on me. LOL. Maybe because I am 1/2 Swede. I have tried several styles of gardening hats but this is the VERY best. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Super airy and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have had the chance to use my hats I have to be honest and tell you that I love them !!!! They are amazingly light and compfortable . I love that my head does not feel like it’s in a oven. I deliver mail and am usually in the sun for 4-5 hours a day so it’s very important to have good head cover . I would recommend this hat to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Gitta Pusateri

customer_reviews.title: Both hats defective, won't stay tightened for my kids
customer_reviews.text: Both hats were defective. One hat's chin strap will not stay tight and the other hat's bungee for the top part loosens on one side. This is super disappointing. The hats also have a little bit awkward fit. Overall I will return them and choose another hat.
customer_reviews.author: TX.Momma.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my active Boy Scout needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. He is fair skinned, blonde hair, blue eyes and needs sun protection. But he also needed something that would easily fold up into his backpack for Boy Scout camping, hiking, etc. He loves the hat.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Heath

customer_reviews.title: hansome and functional
customer_reviews.text: got these for our boys for a trip to Yellowstone. They wore them pretty regularly, which means they must have been pretty comfortable. I think they look cool, too. they provided good sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: friendly swede hat
customer_reviews.text: Great hat!!!!! Fits well with adjustable under the chin strap, brim that will snap up and adjustment for inside fit. Purchased to use for my gardening...if winter ever ends. Easily wiped clean or hand washed...simple, simple. Only problem is that husband person already absconded with one of the hats for his daily walk to the beach!!! So, have just re ordered 2 more. You won't be sorry , and cheap at twice the price..
customer_reviews.author: frikadeller

customer_reviews.title: Brim is a nice size the only thing I would do would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Hats fit true to size but if you have a lot of hair but the next size up. Brim is a nice size the only thing I would do would be to add a thin wire to brim to help shape the hat better but for the money this is a winner! Russ
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like my husband's Columbia fishing hat
customer_reviews.text: TWO for the price of one. Can't beat it. Looks just like my husband's Columbia fishing hat. I do wish the underside was darker to help with reflection but overall a nice buy. The hats came folded "hot dog" style in the package which makes a terrible crase down the middle that will take forever to get rid of. Wish they packed it flat.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Awful fit and cant resize
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a camping trip a few weeks ago. The fit on the hat was off so tried to make tighter, but doing that caused it to be dis formed. You cant button up the sides, all the items of the hat are just for looks and are not functional. These went straight into the trash. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hats, I love that they sell both so ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful hats, I love that they sell both so you can have a spare. Nice lightweight hat that stays on even while riding around in an open vehicle. Shields you from the sun very well. Works great for doing yard work and gardening also. I haven't washed it yet but hope it will last a long time to come!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Uebbing

customer_reviews.title: Nice good price!
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review said I didn’t like the hat. I judge it on not keeping my head cool, but it may just be me!! But the people that made it are very nice and try to help solve my dilemma!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J. Diperna

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels like more expensive hats. I bought more!
customer_reviews.text: Build quality, light weight material and a brim slightly wider than most hats I've seen make this perfect! Looks and feels great and is very breathable. I placed a second order after everyone in the family liked mine better than their various "name brand" sun hats.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So, the hubster said he didn't really want a new hat. Hmm. I ordered this double hat bargain cuz I had a feeling he would take mine once he saw it. Disaster averted! We are now the proud wearers of these quality hats .
customer_reviews.author: K. BATES-ERIKSON

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: as advertised: lightweight, ventilated, adaptable to different size heads, blocks the sun well. I was looking for a more affordable, light as air replacement for my beloved Tilly that has holes, looks like it's been dragged across continents (it has), and is too heavy without ventilation for summer months hiking and fishing. I will probably give away the second hat as a gift to spread the news about the "Friendly Swede."
customer_reviews.author: Allan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Best Booney Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific hats at a great price for two. I have many hats as I seem to forget to bring one on trips and end up buying one at each location. These are lightweight and easily folded to put in a pocket or pack. The vent at the top makes them usuable in the heat where most hats become hot and "steamy" on your head. I highly recommend these hats and the customer service for The Friendly Swede.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: This was a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal!!! My daughter wanted a "safari hat" for her zoo birthday party and I ordered these. They were perfect for blocking the hot Hawaiian sun and unlike a baseball cap didn't make their cute little heads all sweaty. Great quality - especially for the price. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: jenniemommy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, cool, and great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these hats when they were a deal of the day. Then I liked them so much that I bought 4 more. I had some similar hats for my kids that were all canvas, and these are so much better! They are very lightweight and vented, so they won't be hot. I like the strap for when it's windy, and the brim is nice and wide to protect the ears and neck. Just a perfect hat for the hot sun!
customer_reviews.author: DesertMom

customer_reviews.title: Great Hats at a Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for working outdoors on projects in the bright sun in Florida. Perfect for the job. The brim kept the fun off my face, the mesh around the upper part of the hat, let my head and hair and not become overly sweaty. When it got wet, it dried out quickly. Very very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Brock

customer_reviews.title: ... 4 of these friendly swede hats and am very happy i did
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these friendly swede hats and am very happy i did. One for the wife an one each for my 9 and 7 year old boys. Its amazing how they all fit our different sized heads perfectly. Theyre very lightweight, wellmade, breathable and come in at a great price! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: BobbyWhite

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bang for the buck. Great quality for the price. I do however feel that they chose a pretty large starting point for the head size. You'd have to have a huge head or dreadlocks to fill that circumference unless you use the tightening string. I like them though.
customer_reviews.author: Liana S.

customer_reviews.title: Great hats!  Well worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: Got these hats for my husband and I to wear when hiking. They are just what we needed. Adjustable so that we each get a good fit and so loght you can almost forget you are wearing them. The brims are wide enough to provide good shade from the sun. I also love that they are easy to fold up and stuff in my backpack when I don't need it. And getting two in a pack is a great deal. I highly recommend them...a great buy and a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: WillowCat LeCuyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat
customer_reviews.text: I tried them on, they fit fine,have not worn for long periods yet it's still winter. Think they will work out just fine packs nice for trips. And don't worry about the crease that some people are talking about. It's not a big deal. Very breathable material great price you get two.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: These are great, and I got them just in time to ...
customer_reviews.text: Two hats for the price of one ! These are great , and I got them just in time to wear for the Carnival here in sunny Trinidad .Very comfortable to wear and they offer excellent protection from the Sun . The breathable mesh keeps my head cool , and the adjustable drawstrings mean they could fit almost any head size.
customer_reviews.author: Fareed Rajack

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection hat
customer_reviews.text: Great hat for sun protection. Much better than a ball cap or visor. Played golf using it last weekend and it is was still 90 degrees where I live. It stayed cool...or as cool as you would expect with it being this hot in November! And I agree with one of the other reviews: it fit my huge old pumpkin-head!
customer_reviews.author: karl carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach Hat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to wear at the pool/beach. We stay here for 3 months & he wears it almost every day. He likes the mesh band for the air flow & the strap if it gets windy. I haven't tried to wash it yet, but plan to do a gentle or hand wash. It's very light & easy to pack. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: becca gerke

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic for the price! My boys are 4 and 5.5 and even though they were a little too big, they were great for the beach. If they got wet, they dried quickly. I like that we will be able to keep these for several years and they will still fit, and seem durable enough to last that long!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jones-Wommack

customer_reviews.title: These hats were a great buy. They arrived quickly and were well-packaged
customer_reviews.text: My son and I need hats of this style for a trip we're taking this summer where we'll be on a boat for several hours a day. These hats were a great buy. They arrived quickly and were well-packaged. They seem to be well made, with a drawstring to keep the hat secured in the wind. Also great that the sides can be snapped up. Very good customer service from the Friendly Swede with direct follow up to see if I had any questions or comments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A gift for 2 fishermen
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my brother and his wife who both love to fish. The adjustable fit was perfect because she especially had a hard time finding a hat that fit her head. They loved the hats and hopefully will fish with them for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Jor

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight hat
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this hat. Lightweight and the mesh allows ventilation which keeps it cool. A prior review mentioned the hat being received folded for shipping and as a result having a crease. This was not the case when I received my order since the hats were shipped flat, (i.e. unfolded) in a box.
customer_reviews.author: MikeinCA

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Hats
customer_reviews.text: Great hats... They are Cool and Comfortable And offer great shade from the sun... I wore mine while bagpiping I’m the 4th of July parade...
customer_reviews.author: Amiee K. Helms

customer_reviews.title: very nice hat..
customer_reviews.text: just as described.. nice boony fishing hat.... brim is a little stiff but otherwise it is a very nice hat
customer_reviews.author: gary bock

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Hat
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to keep the sun off my face and neck while working in the yard. Very impressed with the quality of construction and materials. Great value compared to some of the name brands out there - But, I'd be hard pressed to see a significant difference. Like that I can use one, get it wet and then switch to a fresh hat if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, cool fabric and adjustable sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for 2 hats! Large enough to fit over my pony tail when walking the beach in the hot Florida sun. I like the vented band around the middle and the ability to adjust the size.. Very cool and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: sgal1

customer_reviews.title: review is for how it fits: great
customer_reviews.text: My boys are 12 and 14, so two years apart, and have different body types and different head circumferences. The hat fit them both well. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great hats at a great price. I bought the light gray (nice color). Fit great, even on my giant melon. They fixed the creased brim issue by packing them flat. Overall, I am very pleased and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Awp

customer_reviews.title: These hats will be terrific for working in the garden and for sunny walks
customer_reviews.text: These hats will be terrific for working in the garden and for sunny walks. I love them.They fit great and the material is very functional. The snaps add to the interest and vary the look .All four of my Grandparents came over on the boat from Sweden so I know what "tack sa mycket" means and I give The Friendly Swede a great big THANKS.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia H.

customer_reviews.title: Keep one and share the other!
customer_reviews.text: Gave them as a gift. Really liked them. My friend only needed one for her hike, so I told her to pass the blessing on to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Helen S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for packing
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are so easy to pack as they completely flatten. Also found the adjustable chin strap kept it from blowing away.
customer_reviews.author: P. Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Material is too thin and wrinkly looking when I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Garth Lurvey

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight hat great for any outdoor activity you have in mind. having two hats for the price of one made it nice as my wife now has one as well as myself
customer_reviews.author: Papa Joe

customer_reviews.title: Really nice hat at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice hat at a reasonable price. The draw string makes the hat a perfect fit. Lightweight, easy to pack and will perfect for keeping the tropical sun off my bald head on my cruise in May. I just received my hats and have no complaints at this time. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is, I don't give five stars to anyone. If you give out five stars for products that do what they're supposed to do, or service that is what it should be, it kind of diminishes the whole rating system. To get five stars from me takes something exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: As described. Fast shipping and well worth it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Thai

customer_reviews.title: 7-1/2 or smaller. Great hats at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: You cant beat the price of these hats. Good quality too. Light weight and breath well. I wear a 7-1/4" hat and these are probably 7-1/2" but can adjust smaller with the cinch. I will use these for me and my kids. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: light - cool and so fun to wear - throw it back over your back - perfect
customer_reviews.text: it was well received at the golf tourney and now i am enjoying wearing it in the 95 degree heat in CT while i garden and fight off the wildabeast bugs
customer_reviews.author: Roxy Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great hat!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Although one of the two hats had a fualty chin strap clip. This rendered it no good on windy days. This is a bummer as I love the hat!
customer_reviews.author: Swannsnest

customer_reviews.title: fit great good buy
customer_reviews.text: great for keeping the sun off of face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Martin R. Zanon

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and does the job well of keeping sun off head and face. it looks good too !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... gift for my in laws and they were very happy with their hats and liked the ventilaton in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my in laws and they were very happy with their hats and liked the ventilaton in the hats for when they go golfing. It will help protect their skin and keep them cool.
customer_reviews.author: Pam. P

customer_reviews.title: A really great warm weather hat!
customer_reviews.text: The hat was exactly as described. Lightweight, well thought out, and well made. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hat, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great hat! Even fits my big noggin’. Kept me from getting too much sun on my 3 day rafting trip. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: strat

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Hats are comfortable to wear while working in the yard and garden. My 7 year old son loves the hat also. The draw string is a major plus. I will ordering more to take on vacation
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The crown seems a little shallow, wish it came down lower on the head, but no complaints for the price. Packed flat and kept the sun off, chin strap was helpful on a windy boat ride.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I looked up mens hats and this came up. I ordered them and they do not fit a man unless his head is tiny. My 5 year old ended up with them instead
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Husband
customer_reviews.text: He thought the hats look ugly, but he wore it and now wants to order the other colors. In the heat, these are great when doing yard work.
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wear this hat daily while at work and it seems to be holding up well. I like the breathable mesh on top. I used to wear a traditonal military style boonie hat always and wanted to try something new. You can really tell a huge difference in this hats ability to keep your head cool. The only issue I have had was with the stampede strap slipping under the securing clasp one time but it was easy to maneuver back into a locking position. I would by this hat again.
customer_reviews.author: PETER R

customer_reviews.title: Like the hats but....
customer_reviews.text: Like these hats. Good quality. My only issue is it's made for small heads. Would not fit my husband nor dad. Barely fits my head. More for a child or youth.
customer_reviews.author: Ceelyn

customer_reviews.title: These hats are great for keeping the heat and sun off my head
customer_reviews.text: These hats are great for keeping the heat and sun off my head. I wear one every day while gardening or walking my dog. It's good they come as a pair because I've already given the other away to a neighbor who wanted one after seeing me with mine.
customer_reviews.author: B C

customer_reviews.title: Stiff brim
customer_reviews.text: The hats look fine but the brim is too stiff. My son is wheelchair bound, and his headrest pushes up against the stiff brim of the hat. I’m going to try washing it to see if it helps and will update.
customer_reviews.author: Linh

customer_reviews.title: One size fits most!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Fits well. Stays cool in the sun. Easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Jarnagin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sun Hat
customer_reviews.text: Appearance and quality look very good. I have worn this style hat for several years for lightweight comfort and shade. My wife wore it this weekend while kayaking and liked it so much she kept it for herself. That says a lot as she does not like to wear hats but always looks good when she does. The price for two hats is less than I have paid for other name brands in the past. This was definitely a good deal. Many thanks to the Friendly Swede Company.
customer_reviews.author: tboss

customer_reviews.title: A good product.
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight and the brim is extra wide. Delivery was fast and the Friendly Swede packaging is 1st class. I looked at what The Friendly Swede products are and I think I will order at least a couple of their items. I enjoyed doing business with The Friendly Swede.
customer_reviews.author: Camo

customer_reviews.title: Great hats
customer_reviews.text: I work outside all day and these hats are great. Plenty of cover and take to sweat well trust me I’m from West Texas where it’s been over 100 to110 one day great hats
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these hats! They are light and comfortable and just fun to wear in general. The reason I gave 4 stars is due to the fact that one of the plastic snaps pulled apart shortly after receiving the product. It was a quick and easy fix with a dab of super glue. The hats are very well constructed otherwise. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Hats are of good quality. The size adjustment works well
customer_reviews.text: Hats are of good quality. The size adjustment works well. Good price for two where most others are similar price or more for one. My only complaint is that the vent area in the crown could be larger for better air flow. Also, the crown could be a tad taller.
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: Extremely please and better then I expected
customer_reviews.text: Extremely please and better then I expected. If you are looking for a wide brim hat with ventilation I would recommend these hats. Adjustable for various hat sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great hats!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the hats - will go perfectly with our Australian themed costumes and we are already using them for sun protection while working in the yard and lounging in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Nice for heads with thick hair or larger heads
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful price, goid coverage, live them...keep one at work and one at home to protect face from sun damage:) Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sun hat for my 7yo
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my 7 year old, but he does like his stuff a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: krys0100

product_meta.title: The Friendly Swede Sun Hat 2-Pack - Fishing Boonie Hat for Safari and Summer
feature_bullets: MULTIPLE USES: Our safari hats are versatile and can be used for various outdoor activities. They fit well, keep the sun off and are comfy for long wear. Use the boonie hats as backpacking hat, fishing hat, hiking hat, gardening hat, while camping, driving, laying at the beach or hiking in the outback.

FAMILY VALUE PACK AND ADJUSTABLE SIZE: You receive TWO functional and trendy outdoor hats which is a true value. The adjustable chin strap will ensure to keep the hat in place. The drawstring makes it easy to adjust size. Therefore, our sun hats can be used by the entire family and are suitable for men, women, boys and girls.

MESH PANEL FOR AIR FLOW: Our golf hats have also added a mesh panel that allows air flow for ventilation and will aid to keep you cool. All of this, plus a cotton panel on the inside of the hat will absorb any excess perspiration. A bonus feature includes a snap button on each side of the hat so you can decide if you want to wear the brim up or down.

19 CM DIAMETER: The inner diameter of the outback hat is 19 cm and could be smaller if you decide to use the adjustable drawstring. The material of the hat is soft and will conform slightly to the shape of your head.

LIFETIME WARRANTY: Those booney hats are covered by The Friendly Swede's Lifetime Warranty which you can register for on our website. Our customer service team is here for you and happy to help answer ANY questions you may have in <24hrs. Just copy-paste this link into your browser: http://amzn.to/1AmGlj8
